summary: Plays The Dragonborn Comes when you escape Helgen.
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the intro music with The Dragonborn Comes.

Music: Malukah - The Dragonborn Comes (Orchestral Version by Doug Farrell)

Installation: copy to game folder: Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data
- Incase the audio doesn't play, I recommend downloading the MP3 from [url=http://www.icompositions.com/music/song.php?sid=171950]http://www.icompositions.com/music/song.php?sid=171950[/url] and copying it to Data\music\Malukah
Uninstall: Delete from the Data folder

This mod is compatible with Special Edition.
author: AKeithY
